title: Mars Organics Can’t Be Fully Explained by Geological Processes Alone, NASA Study Says
desc: Known non-biological sources, from meteorites to surface chemistry, fall short of accounting for organic compounds detected by NASA’s Curiosity rover, according to a new study published in the journal Astrobiology.

title: St Pauli plotting their next miracle in tantalising Bundesliga survival battle
desc: An unlikely win over Stuttgart was an overdue reminder that unity remains St Pauli’s greatest strength in defying the odds again

title: Tundu Lissu’s Treason Trial Resumes With Fierce Legal Debate Over ‘Secret Witness’
desc: Lissu’s treason trial resumes amid a contentious legal clash over the prosecution’s secret witness, which he decries as a mockery of justice.

title: Man caught on video cutting community cat's fur with scissors in Everton Park
desc: A well-loved community cat in Everton Park was allegedly held down by a man who cut off patches of its fur with a pair of scissors. Closed-circuit television footage of the incident, which purportedly went on for six minutes, was posted on Sunday (Feb 8) on Instagram by @timmytheblackcat_, a page dedicated to the black cat named Timmy. In the...

title: Commander Shake-Up Speculation Drives Up Banlist Card Prices
desc: Speculation about today’s changes to the Commander ban list have caused upheaval in the card market as players speculate on what could be unbanned, with some cards nearly quintupling in price.

title: Statement from Christine Lagarde, President of the European Central Bank
desc: The European Central Bank (ECB) is the central bank of the European Union countries which have adopted the euro. Our main task is to maintain price stability in the euro area and so preserve the purchasing power of the single currency.

title: Trader to be charged over road rage following minor accident
desc: Kajang police chief Naazron Yusof says the 52-year-old will be charged with voluntarily causing hurt and criminal intimidation.
